description:
Kanata`s new life begins in the 1121`s Platoon`s station, Clocktower Fortress. There she meets the kind captain Felicia, her trumpet teacher Rio, the quiet Noel, and the youngest member of the squad, Kureha. Kanata quickly fits in with the relaxed atmosphere of the group. She is then given her first mission - what will it be?
Source: crunchyroll
